actionable_quotes.quote: Everyone wants to build GPT rappers, micro SAS. I get it. It's super super sexy. But there's a huge opportunity right now to be using AI for boring businesses.

actionable_quotes.quote: an SEO agency or a digital marketing agency would charge you an arm and a leg to go and like build out a website, create 50 plus pages, optimize the entire thing so that it'll rank for uh the keywords that are relevant to your company. Uh, using Claude Code, I was able to do all of this in a matter of hours.
